Articles.Content:
Everyone's favorite game, now in the Lounge! The rules are simple!

Answer the previous posters question, then post your own. You must answer with one of the answers, or your question should be skipped over.

If you want to ask me about 3 choice questions, message me.

I'll start: Would you rather... never go past the Mun, but have all missions be successful, or go wherever you want, but 1 in 6 of your missions fail in a spectacular way?

Edited August 28, 2016 by TopHeavy11

I would rather go wherever I want to and have 1/6 of my missions create some cool fireworks.

Would you rather sit down on Kepler-70b or run on Kepler-131c?

(70b has really high temperatures, 131c has really high gravity)

131c. Can't stand the heat man.

Would you rather, go to Eve and back with 5 Kerbals or fly to Laythe and back in an SSTO with no mining or refueling?

Eve and back with 5 kerbals.

Would you rather: not resupply a space station, or not resupply a base (assume you're using life support mods)

not resupply a base, it can be made to sustain itself

Would you rather: Play Elite:Dangerous or No Man's Sky?

I rather play Elite:Dangerous! 

Would you rather go to Duna in a Mk1 command pod OR land on Eve and stay there for rest of your life?

Duna in a Mk1 command pod. It's not that bad, and the Kerbal can still get home...

I think.

Would you rather meet the Kraken while launching from Eve or landing 20 kerbals on Eeloo?

Launching from Eve.

Would you rather fly out of the solar system with no ways of returning or just crash into the Sun?

Fly out of the solar system. Who knows where I'll end up? Maybe I'll become immortal and have a warp drive that can go anywhere but back to the solar system.

Would you rather explore this universe, or another universe which has a 1/3rd chance of have different physics, elements, and whatever else that could be changed?

I would explore this universe, we haven't even really started exploring it! Probes can do only so much…

Would you rather have to use the old pre-Porkjet spaceplane parts or not get the rocket parts revamp?

Pre-porkjet. Either one is hell in KSP.

Would you rather have a 60s spiderman meme take over this thread, or one of your threads?

One of my threads (i've made some pretty bad ones and i really like this one)

Would you rather bathe in a bathtub full of capsaicin or house centipedes?

Centipedes. I don't bathe anyways. I shower.

 

Would you rather face the Blue Screen of Death, or look a smile.jpg?

I've had too many blue screens lately, I'll take the latter.

Would you rather eat cooked grasshoppers or centipedes?

Grasshoppers. I can cut them up, deep fry them, and use them as a topping.

Would you rather help me come up with a question or leave me in the dust?

Come up with a question, because volunteering!

 

Would you rather eat pizza or salad?

Pizza,I love pizza.

 

Would you rather invent the next steam engine and you get forgotten or get remembered for all the treble one's you did?

Steam engine, because I don't want to be known for playing only the right side of the piano.

 

Would you rather (3 choice ahead,) be the King of the World but die at the age of 32, be hated, but live to 120, or live an average life with an average lifespan?

Edited August 28, 2016 by TopHeavy11

Average life with average lifespan.

Would you rather: Have super-fast internet, or, have KSP load super-quickly

Fast Internet

Would you rather fall into a pit of fire and see all the amazing stuff in the universe or be safe and never know what is out there?

Fall.

 

Would you rather command an Imperial Star Destroyer, or command the Enterprise?

Edited August 28, 2016 by TopHeavy11

Enterpriss. It's better since it's in a galaxy close to here.

Would you rather post here or in another thread?

Another thread. Wait...ok, maybe I'd rather post in the "Solve a Paradox" thread now...

Would you rather look at Saturn or Jupiter in a small telescope, given you can only look at one of them and both are reasonably visible?

Edited August 29, 2016 by cubinator

Saturn because Titan.

 

Would you rather be on Alderan in A New Hope, or be assimilated by the Borg?

Edited August 29, 2016 by TopHeavy11

Definitely, Borg. Internet gets faster, and you gain self-backups. Also, no more need in batteries for a mouse.
(In fact, it's a question: who would be assimilated),

Which way you choose in Mass Effect III: kill'em all and sacrifice Shepard - or kill'em all and sacrifice Shepard?
